mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member ( email, nickname, username, password, regdate, phone_number, type, auth_data, is_sms_consent, is_email_consent ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{nickname}, #{username}, #{password}, #{regdate}, #{phone_number}, #{type}, #{auth_data}, #{is_sms_consent}, #{is_email_consent} )
